meanings.definition: A person or thing that confirms.
meanings.sent1: The confirmers at the meeting all agreed with the decision.
meanings.sent2: The confirmers of the test results provided valuable feedback.
meanings.sent3: The confirmers of the group's plan were the most enthusiastic supporters.
meanings.sent4: She was like a walking confirmer, always validating others' ideas.
meanings.sent5: The confirmers in the courtroom nodded in approval as the verdict was read.

meanings.definition: A substance or object that confirms.
meanings.sent1: The lab equipment served as the confirmers of the experiment's success.
meanings.sent2: The confirmers in the packaging ensured the product's authenticity.
meanings.sent3: The confirmers in the recipe added an extra layer of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The fingerprint match was the ultimate confirmer of the suspect's identity.
meanings.sent5: The confirmers in the system verified the security of the transaction.
